0.Pros: The best part is that i get to meet new people every day, I love meeting new people.
0.Cons: Its not where i would like my job to be.

1.Pros: McDonalds is a great place to work if you have a good team atmosphere. Ours was extremely good because we worked well as a team. There are many positives about working with great coworkers. Some positives of the job were also that we received a free meal if we worked a full shift.McDonalds always accommodated my schedule when I had to go to other events. This really helped and ensured I could work there as I found a profession. The work itself was really easy to catch onto. You dont have to think about too much and they made everything really easy to understand. At the beginning I was nervous that I wouldnt be able to understand the system, but after just a few hours I already had caught on and could perform the functions.
1.Cons: It is McDonalds, the customer base wasnt great and the complaints were frequent.

2.Pros: Run youre own shift\Motivate youre employees

3.Summary: "they was expecting too much of you at this restaurant"
3.Pros: free food when you work there
3.Cons: you have too work all these hours

4.Pros: McD is an established, financially solid company. Can be proud of the Brand and supporting system. Position on supporting Ronald McDonald House Charities is great
4.Cons: The company needs to change, but the focus and pace of change is not focused on what will drive results

6.Summary: "Not what I was expecting at all"
6.Pros: good paycheck with somewhat friendly co workers
6.Cons: terrible customers and worked a lot of hours

7.Pros: You got to work with great people and even meet some unusual ones through drive thru.
7.Cons: The pay wasnt the greatest and there was no room for advancement. If you weren't really good friends with a manager then you wouldn't get a manager position. There were no performance reviews or even raises. There idea of full time was 30 hours a week and even then that was iffy. I only knew a few that had 39 hours a week and the severely discouraged overtime.

8.Pros: They work well with my schedule
8.Cons: No vacation time. Even after being there for almost 3 years.

9.Pros: I wanna work there and have a good time with my workers and make a lotOf money and just helping out and being a careful worker
